Stats.Name: Light Calvary
Stats.Image: Location to Image in a folder
Stats.Flavor Text: The calvary was the first break the shields, in their wake the villages fell

Stats.Name: Heavy Bowman
Stats.Flavor Text: Even riding at full speed, his aim never seemed to fail

Stats.Name: General
Stats.Flavor Text: His presence on the field didn't just rally his men, it bit at the heart of ours

Stats.Name: Supply the Troops
Stats.Ability: Humans you control gaine +1 to their power and health
Stats.Flavor Text: We have a new shipment of swords and shields, my soldiers should have the best.
